Metadata.name: Chronnote
Metadata.title: Chronnote ‚Äì All-in-one AI notes & knowledge base
Metadata.description: Chronnote is a local-first all-in-one notes and knowledge base that turns notes, PDFs, tasks, mind maps and whiteboards into atoms. The built-in Chron Engine searches, links and orchestrates these atoms in a single workspace.

AboutPage.description: Chronnote focuses on capture, organization, reasoning and publishing ‚Äî solid local data, smooth editing & search, and built-in AI collaboration.

hero.title: All-in-one atomic knowledge workspace
hero.description: Break the boundaries of format. In this atom-based Knowledge OS, notes, maps, and document clips are no longer separate entities but malleable Knowledge Atoms. The Chron Engine allows you to seamlessly shift forms and weave connections in one boundless workspace.

integration.title: Chronnote System Pillars
integration.subtitle: Atomic knowledge meets the Chron Engine
integration.description: Notes, reading, tasks, whiteboards, mind maps and AI scheduling live in one semantic space so every spark of information can be reactivated.

item-1.title: Chron Mindmap
item-1.description: Chron Mindmap turns atoms into draggable nodes on a canvas so you can sketch branching structures while staying in sync with the Atom Library and pages.

item-2.title: Chron Editor
item-2.description: A two-sided editor you can flip with one click: sketch structure and brainstorm on the whiteboard side, then flip back to the editor side to focus on writing while both stay in sync.

item-3.title: Chron Reader
item-3.description: Layered PDF library with highlights, annotations, instant translation and one-tap handoff to the Chron Engine for deeper explanations.

item-4.title: Atom Library
item-4.description: Notes, PDFs, tasks, mind maps and boards all exist as atoms. Drop them into any page and every representation stays perfectly in sync.

item-5.title: Chron Whiteboard
item-5.description: Chron Whiteboard is an infinite canvas where you can drop atoms, images and map nodes, rearrange them freely, and connect ideas with lines and clusters.

item-6.title: Chron TodoList
item-6.description: Chron TodoList pairs nested tasks with notes, while the Chron Engine auto-generates review or practice items whenever it spots gaps in your knowledge.

download.title: Download Chronnote
download.description: Pick your platform and start exploring the Chronnote atomic workspace on your device.

mac.title: macOS
mac.subtitle: Universal builds with Chron Engine running locally

web.title: Web workspace
web.description: Browser version is currently in closed beta.

ios.title: iOS app
ios.description: Native Chronnote experience for iPhone and iPad.

android.title: Android app
android.description: Capture and organize ideas on Android devices.

integration2.title: Compose your daily workflow
integration2.description: From AI assistant to local database and system hooks, Chronnote focuses on composable productivity.

features.title: Atomic design: frictionless knowledge flow
features.subtitle: One atom, many representations
features.description: Inside Chronnote everything is an atom‚Äînotes, mind maps, tasks and PDF snippets. Mention it with @ or drag it anywhere and the same piece of knowledge flows between every view.

item-1.title: Note atoms ‚áÑ mind-map nodes
item-1.description: Pick a PDF highlight to spawn a note atom. Drop it into a mind map and it instantly becomes a structured node. Double-click to expand the entire note and every edit stays synced.

item-2.title: Note atoms ‚áÑ to-do items
item-2.description: Not confident about a concept? Flag that atom as a task. It shows up in your to-do stack with full context and in-place references. Check it off and the note captures your latest understanding.

item-3.title: PDF atoms ‚áÑ note atoms
item-3.description: Annotate directly inside the PDF and get a standalone note atom. Wherever you reference it‚Äîmind map, task list, whiteboard‚Äîa double-click jumps back to the exact spot in the document.

item-4.title: Single source of truth
item-4.description: Change an atom once and every view updates instantly. No duplicate pages, no copy-and-paste islands‚Äîthe same knowledge powers every action.

features2.title: Page View: Atomic References at Work
features2.subtitle: Nest pages while every block still lives in the atom library
features2.description: Chronnote keeps the familiar page layout, but each page is only a reference to atoms. Open the atom library in the sidebar, drag anything into the page to create a reference, and double-click to jump back to the source atom‚Äîedits stay perfectly in sync.
features2.feature-1: Pages mirror atoms: a page never stores data itself, it reflects what sits in the atom library.
features2.feature-2: Drag-and-drop mounting: choose an atom in the library and drop it into the page view to reuse it instantly.
features2.feature-3: Safe deletion: removing a reference leaves the atom intact; deleting the atom removes every reference across pages.
features2.feature-4: Semantic nesting: mix PDFs, notes, to-dos or boards as parent/child nodes to express precise context.

features3.title: Chron Engine: your AI learning accelerator
features3.subtitle: Let AI truly work on your knowledge
features3.description: Chron Engine isn‚Äôt just a chatbot‚Äîit‚Äôs the dispatcher for your second brain. It understands context, links atoms, and even predicts what you should tackle next so every study session compounds.

item-1.title: Context-aware linking
item-1.description: While you review, Chron Engine surfaces related atoms, PDF fragments, and past thoughts‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs grammar notes or algorithm drafts‚Äîso your knowledge graph grows automatically.

item-2.title: Smart placement suggestions
item-2.description: After you create a note atom, the engine analyses it and recommends where it should live‚Äî‚Äúattach this to the LR-parsing branch‚Äù‚Äîguiding you like a domain expert.

item-3.title: Spaced repetition scheduling
item-3.description: Chron Engine tracks forgetting curves and time, then schedules reviews‚Äî‚Äúyou haven‚Äôt revisited LR parsing in three days, bring it back tomorrow‚Äù‚Äîso future-you always gets support.

item-4.title: Thinking trail capture
item-4.description: Every insight shift is logged‚Äîfrom ‚ÄúA=B‚Äù to ‚ÄúA=C.‚Äù Ask months later why LR parsing felt hard and Chron Engine can replay the exact confusion and resolution.

item-5.title: Auto-generated action items
item-5.description: Hit a tough PDF passage? The engine spins up a task like ‚Äúimplement a quick proof-of-concept‚Äù so theory immediately meets practice.

item-6.title: Knowledge fusion
item-6.description: Drop atoms from three different domains onto the whiteboard and Chron Engine discovers the links‚Äîor proposes an entirely new idea born from the overlap.

pricing.title: Choose your acceleration level
pricing.subtitle: Invest in becoming a super-learner
pricing.description: Whether you are a student, researcher, or lifelong learner, pick the plan that helps you build a resilient second brain.

item-1.question: What is ‚Äúatomic design‚Äù?
item-1.answer: Every piece of knowledge is an atom. Notes, mind-map nodes, tasks and PDFs are all the same entity, just viewed differently‚Äîso you never duplicate or copy/paste.

item-3.question: How can I get help or send feedback?
item-3.answer: At the bottom of the website you‚Äôll find links to our Xiaohongshu, WeChat, and QQ communities‚Äîjoin any group to ask questions or share feedback, or email us directly at 1155181470@link.cuhk.edu.hk.

item-4.question: Will there be a mobile and tablet version?
item-4.answer: Yes. We plan to ship a minimal mobile experience starting in Q1 2026. Dedicated tablet support will be evaluated and rolled out later based on real usage and feedback.

item-5.question: Why choose Chronnote over other note or knowledge tools?
item-5.answer: Chronnote blends the strengths of an AI-native knowledge base with a powerful note system, unifying notes, mind-maps, PDFs, tasks, and boards as the same atoms in one all-in-one workspace. Instead of scattering your life across separate apps, Chronnote sees your full context, so the AI is no longer guessing from fragments but responding to a much more complete picture of you.

item-1.name: Jonathan Yombo
item-1.quote: MkSaaS is really extraordinary and very practical, no need to break your head. A real gold mine.

item-2.name: Yves Kalume
item-2.quote: With no experience in webdesign I just redesigned my entire website in a few minutes with tailwindcss thanks to MkSaaS.

item-3.name: Yucel Faruksahan
item-3.quote: Great work on MkSaaS template. This is one of the best personal website that I have seen so far :)

item-4.name: Anonymous author
item-4.quote: I downloaded the one of MkSaaS template which is very clear to understand at the start and you could modify the codes/blocks to fit perfectly on your purpose of the page.

item-5.name: Shekinah Tshiokufila
item-5.quote: MkSaaS is redefining the standard of web design, with these blocks it provides an easy and efficient way for those who love beauty but may lack the time to implement it.

item-6.name: Oketa Fred
item-6.quote: I absolutely love MkSaaS! The component blocks are beautifully designed and easy to use, which makes creating a great-looking website a breeze.

item-7.name: Zeki
item-7.quote: MkSaaS is the perfect fusion of simplicity and versatility, enabling us to create UIs that are as stunning as they are user-friendly.

item-8.name: Joseph Kitheka
item-8.quote: MkSaaS has transformed the way I develop web applications. Their extensive collection of UI components, blocks, and templates has significantly accelerated my workflow.

item-9.name: Khatab Wedaa
item-9.quote: MkSaaS is an elegant, clean, and responsive tailwind css components it's very helpful to start fast with your project.

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: I love MkSaaS ‚ù§Ô∏è. The component blocks are well-structured, simple to use, and beautifully designed. It makes it really easy to have a good-looking website in no time.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: MkSaaS templates are the perfect solution for anyone who wants to create a beautiful and functional website without any web design experience.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: MkSaaS is so well designed that even with a very poor knowledge of web design you can do miracles. Let yourself be seduced!
